name: iHunt 3D Lite
description:
**NEWS**
Check out our newest app: iFish Pond! **50% off introductory sale! Limited time!**
********

The most realistic handheld hunting game now has a lite version!!

Experience the thrill of lining up that big buck in your scope and squeezing the trigger! Actual 3D landscape and highly detailed buck and doe models. Look around freely from your hunting stand, line up the deer in your adjustable scope, and FIRE!

Features:
- Realistic 3D landscape
- Mauser rifle
- Highly detailed buck and doe models
- Super smooth animations
- Adjusts the lighting based on the time you play
- 'Bullet-tracking' when you fire!!
- 4 different seasons

Gameplay hint: double-tapping brings up the rifle scope in the middle of the screen.

Upgrade to the full version to get:
- NEW WEAPONS: A shotgun and a compound bow!
- NEW ANIMAL: Shoot geese out of the sky with any of the weapons
- UPGRADED EQUIPMENT: Earn cash and upgrade your equipment at the hunting store
- CAREER MODE: Earn experience points and progress your way from novice to master hunter and beyond
- CHALLENGE MODE: Try to hit the animals farthest away to get on the online leaderboard!
